content: Worryfree Brew is one of the nine total Drinks in Black Myth: Wukong. It is found in the second half of the game, specifically within The Webbed Hollow.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Worryfree_Brew.md', within the main section titled 'Worryfree Brew'.
The content is as follows:
Worryfree Brew is one of the nine total Drinks in Black Myth: Wukong. It is found in the second half of the game, specifically within The Webbed Hollow.
